recommendations.name: Nvidia Corporation
recommendations.wsbNote: 63% positive sentiment; 113 mentions in 24hrs; perennial WSB favorite
risks: China export restrictions ($4.5B charge taken; $50B market at risk)
Competition from AMD MI450 and custom silicon (TPUs, Trainium)
15% below ATH; needs Vera Rubin execution
recommendations.justification: 80%+ AI GPU share; Vera Rubin in production 2 quarters early; PEG 0.72; $500B revenue visibility; 38 Buy ratings

recommendations.name: Broadcom Inc
risks: Customer concentration (Google, Meta, ByteDance, OpenAI, Anthropic)
recommendations.justification: $73B AI backlog; AI revenue +100% YoY to $40B+ in FY26; 60-70% ASIC market share; 46 Buy ratings

recommendations.name: Taiwan Semiconductor
recommendations.wsbNote: Strategic infrastructure play; 78% positive Reddit sentiment
risks: Geopolitical Taiwan/China risk (60% capacity in Taiwan)
Overseas fab execution challenges vs Taiwan efficiency
recommendations.justification: 90%+ advanced node market share; 30% FY26 revenue growth; 2nm in HVM; $52-56B capex; forward P/E 19-26x

recommendations.name: Marvell Technology
risks: Unconfirmed Trainium 3/4 losses to Alchip speculation
recommendations.justification: 39% below 52-week high; PEG 0.12-0.79; 5-year AWS deal secured; AI >50% of data center revenue

recommendations.name: Astera Labs
recommendations.justification: Only PCIe Gen 6 provider; Scorpio fabric switches in production; 104% revenue growth; $20B TAM by 2030

recommendations.name: Meta Platforms

risks: Reality Labs losing ~$24B/year; margin compression to 41%
EU regulatory fines; youth safety litigation
recommendations.justification: Q4 beat +24% YoY; Advantage+ at $60B run rate; cheapest Mag-7 at 22x forward P/E; 41 Buy ratings

recommendations.name: Alphabet Inc
recommendations.wsbNote: WSB #4 pick for 2026; best-performing Mag-7 YTD; J.P. Morgan top pick
risks: DOJ antitrust appeal (Feb 3 filed); potential remedies
recommendations.justification: Gemini 3 leading benchmarks; Cloud +40% growth potential; $155B backlog; forward P/E 27x; Q4 earnings Feb 4

recommendations.name: Amazon.com

$150B+ capex in 2026 with uncertain AI ROI
Q4 earnings Feb 5 - AWS margin pressure
recommendations.justification: AWS reaccelerating at 20%+; Trainium3 ramping; $200B backlog; Anthropic partnership could add $6B revenue

recommendations.name: CrowdStrike Holdings
recommendations.wsbNote: Sentiment recovering post-July 2024 outage; 97% customer retention
recommendations.justification: Net new ARR +73% YoY (record); Charlotte AI agentic SOC; 97% retention post-outage; 35 Buy ratings

recommendations.name: Palo Alto Networks
risks: $25B CyberArk deal adds debt and dilution
recommendations.justification: XSIAM $1B+ bookings (fastest ever); IBM QRadar migration deadline Apr 2026; 21% below 52-week high

risks: Competition from CRWD and PANW platformization
recommendations.justification: Leading zero trust pure-play; RPO +35% YoY (accelerating); AI Security ARR $400M+; 40% below 52-week high

recommendations.name: Datadog

recommendations.justification: Best-in-class AI observability; Bits AI SRE agent; Rule of 40 score 78; 35% below 52-week high

risks: FERC regulatory risk on behind-the-meter deals
recommendations.justification: 20-year Meta deal for 2,609MW nuclear; 41GW competitive fleet; 96% hedged for 2026; unanimous Buy ratings

AWS concentration risk; $3.45B gas acquisition adds debt

recommendations.name: Vertiv Holdings
recommendations.wsbNote: 70/100 neutral sentiment; not a WSB play
risks: Trading near all-time highs (limited near-term upside)
recommendations.justification: $9.5B backlog; 60% order growth YoY; NVIDIA GB200 liquid cooling partnership; earnings Feb 11

recommendations.name: Micron Technology
recommendations.wsbNote: Extremely bullish retail sentiment; viral YOLO success stories; retail often late to memory cycles
risks: Up 247% in 12 months - priced for perfection
recommendations.justification: Excellent HBM fundamentals but terrible entry. Q2 guide $18.7B/68% GM is priced in. Wait for $350-400.

recommendations.name: ASML Holding
recommendations.wsbNote: WSB mentions up 200% recently; 86% positive sentiment; monopoly narrative strong
risks: China revenue dropping from 33% to 20% in 2026
Near ATH with limited upside to analyst targets
recommendations.justification: Monopoly position excellent but wait for better entry. Record EUR 38.8B backlog priced in. Target $1,100-1,250.

recommendations.name: Rocket Lab USA
recommendations.wsbNote: WSB #2 pick for 2026; space hype play; retail favorite
risks: Trading ABOVE median analyst target of $69-72
SpaceX can undercut Neutron pricing; -$220M annual cash burn
recommendations.justification: Excellent company but WSB momentum already priced in after 172%+ rally. Wait for $55-65 or Neutron success.

recommendations.name: Cameco Corporation
recommendations.wsbNote: Uranium/nuclear hype; retail sentiment diverges from valuation reality
recommendations.justification: Strong long-term thesis but overvalued. Wait for pullback to $90-105. Prefer VST/TLN for nuclear exposure.

recommendations.name: Seagate Technology
risks: Up 600% from 52-week low; trading above targets
Capacity fully committed - limited upside surprise
recommendations.justification: HAMR technology excellent but stock priced for perfection. Wait for pullback to $330-380.
